skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a MERN stack developer, I build dynamic and responsive UIs using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I focus on creating seamless and visually appealing web applications. My goal is to enhance user experiences through modern design and efficient coding practices.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a MERN stack developer, I design and manage server-side logic with Node.js and Express. I handle data storage and retrieval using MongoDB, ensuring efficient and scalable backend solutions. My focus is on building robust APIs and maintaining smooth integration with front-end components.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces, focusing on both aesthetic appeal and functionality. My approach involves creating wireframes and prototypes to ensure a seamless user experience and engaging design.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I leverage Webflow to create responsive and visually striking websites with a focus on user experience and performance. My expertise includes designing layouts, interactions, and animations while ensuring smooth cross-browser compatibility.
